name: Costa Rica RSV Robusto
additionalNotes: This cigar is made exclusively from Sun Grown Tobacco and has a mild body blend. It has a base of Cuban Seed tobacco, Nicaraguan Seco and a higher percentage of Costa Rican Seco, Viso and Ligero. It is a Long Filler cigar with wrapper and binder of Indonesian seed origin. It features a complex blend of Long Filler tobaccos: Nicaraguan Seco, Viso, Ligero, Jalapa Ligero, Costa Rican Ligero and Seco.
